creator: CardFlight
descriptionHtml:
Accept credit card payments on the go - SwipeSimple gives you the tools to take credit card payments anytime, anywhere.

HOW IT WORKS:

1. In order to start taking payments through SwipeSimple, you must have a SwipeSimple account. If you don't already, sign up for a SwipeSimple account through a verified Reseller. Resellers can be found here: (https://cardflight.com/resources/customers-and-partners/)
2. Download the SwipeSimple app.
3. Connect to your device to you reader. If you have a Bluetooth reader, connect via the SwipeSimple app, not your phone settings .
4. Take your first transaction.



KEY FEATURES:

Record cash sales.
Automatic tax calculation.
Automatically prompt for tip (adjustable percentages) and signature.
Easily create discounts, either cash or percentage.
Real time reporting tools to help you grow and manage your business.
View transaction details and track which items are selling well.
Keep track of inventory by uploading an existing inventory list to SwipeSimple or by adding items manually through the app.
Support for multiple merchant accounts with one login.
Able to keep sensitive data separated by using Administrative and User permissions.


SwipeSimple is powered by the CardFlight Mobile Payments API (https://cardflight.com)
descriptionShort: SwipeSimple gives you the tools to take credit card payments anytime, anywhere.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This SwipeSimple App update allows a user to fully control when signature is prompted for and contains a bug fix for improved app performance.

This update also includes some bug fixes.

1. In order to start taking payments through SwipeSimple, you must have a SwipeSimple account. If you don't already, sign up for a SwipeSimple account through a verified Reseller. Resellers can be found here: (https://cardflight.com/resources/customers-and-partners/)
2. Download the SwipeSimple app.
3. Connect to your device to you reader. If you have a Bluetooth reader, connect via the SwipeSimple app, not your phone settings .
4. Take your first transaction.



KEY FEATURES:

Record cash sales.
Automatic tax calculation.
Automatically prompt for tip (adjustable percentages) and signature.
Easily create discounts, either cash or percentage.
Real time reporting tools to help you grow and manage your business.
View transaction details and track which items are selling well.
Keep track of inventory by uploading an existing inventory list to SwipeSimple or by adding items manually through the app.
Support for multiple merchant accounts with one login.
Able to keep sensitive data separated by using Administrative and User permissions.


SwipeSimple is powered by the CardFlight Mobile Payments API (https://cardflight.com)
descriptionShort: SwipeSimple gives you the tools to take credit card payments anytime, anywhere.

1. In order to start taking payments through SwipeSimple, you must have a SwipeSimple account. If you don't already, sign up for a SwipeSimple account through a verified Reseller. Resellers can be found here: (https://cardflight.com/resources/customers-and-partners/)
2. Download the SwipeSimple app.
3. Connect to your device to you reader. If you have a Bluetooth reader, connect via the SwipeSimple app, not your phone settings .
4. Take your first transaction.



KEY FEATURES:

Record cash sales.
Automatic tax calculation.
Automatically prompt for tip (adjustable percentages) and signature.
Easily create discounts, either cash or percentage.
Real time reporting tools to help you grow and manage your business.
View transaction details and track which items are selling well.
Keep track of inventory by uploading an existing inventory list to SwipeSimple or by adding items manually through the app.
Support for multiple merchant accounts with one login.
Able to keep sensitive data separated by using Administrative and User permissions.


SwipeSimple is powered by the CardFlight Mobile Payments API (https://cardflight.com)
descriptionShort: SwipeSimple gives you the tools to take credit card payments anytime, anywhere.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Features: Merchants using B250 readers with serial numbers starting with CHB20F will be prompted to update firmware, a preventative step which may solve issues that merchants with readers from this batch have experienced.
Bug fixes: Android 13 users can now see B200 devices in the connection list and easily connect to them.
Users will now see a “Remove Card” message whenever is required on a transaction.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: In this release, we’re making it easier to use card readers. We’ve streamlined first-time setup, improved troubleshooting for connection issues, and added the ability to see your reader’s name and battery level. Don’t use a Bluetooth reader? You can now opt out for faster access to keyed transactions. We’ve also enhanced offline mode—you can now save cards to customer profiles during offline transactions.
